title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XL, pt. 2420 - Wage And Salary Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XL, pt. 2420 - Wage And Salary Policy

State Regulations
§ 2420.1 - Extension of the wage freeze
§ 2420.2 - General wage and salary policies

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XL, pt. 2420

Statutory authority: New York State Financial Emergency Act

For the City of New York, §§ 7, 10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
